ARABIC: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَٰسِقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Any who turn away after that are deviators.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then any one who turns away will be a transgressor."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then whosoever shall turn away from this covenant they are the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: After this, whoever turns away will be of the evil-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So those who turn away after this – it is they who are the sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then whoever turns away after this, they are the rebellious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Whoever therefore turns back after this, these it is that are the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then whosoever turns his back after that -- they are the ungodly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then whosoever after this shall turn away: they will be miscreants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Now whoever turns away after this, are surely transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore whosoever shall turn away thereafter -those then! they are the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then whoever turns away after that—it is they who are the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If any turn back after this, they are perverted transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then whoever turns away after this, they are the Fasiqun (rebellious: those who turn away from Allah's Obedience).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Whosoever turns back after that, they are the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Whoever turns away after that—these are the deceitful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And whoever turned away after that - they were the defiantly disobedient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:82] Then whoever turns his back, in rejection, after that, covenant, they are the wicked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then whosoever after this) the covenant (shall turn away) from among the nations: (they will be miscreants) who have broken the covenant and are unbelievers.
